data.subject: Don`t Bring Me Reminders (Remastered)
data.lyric:
Everything they say seems so insubstantial
 A word of caution
 Take care of what you got
 It didn't

data.subject: Lorries (Remastered)
data.lyric:
Always descriptive, lorries green or blue
 Backwards from Italy or Czechoslovakia
 Looking east, dem
